Sentencas: In conventional gas-turbine cycles, a significant amount of heat is generated and gets unutilized, which results in lower thermal efficiency and higher exergy destruction.
Titulo: Waste heat recovery and exergy-based comparison of a conventional and a novel fuel cell integrated gas turbine hybrid configuration

Sentencas: In this study, the available waste heat from the gasturbine has been examined, considering the promising ways to utilize this waste heat.
Titulo: Waste heat recovery and exergy-based comparison of a conventional and a novel fuel cell integrated gas turbine hybrid configuration

Sentencas: By integrating a waste heat recovery system, these losses can be overcome, and its exergy destruction can be minimized, and results in higher thermal efficiency.
Titulo: Waste heat recovery and exergy-based comparison of a conventional and a novel fuel cell integrated gas turbine hybrid configuration

Sentencas: For this, a novel comparison has been made between simple gas-turbine without waste heat recovery, recuperated gas-turbine with single-stage recovery, and a solid oxide fuel cell recuperated gasturbine with double-stage waste heat recovery hybrid system in terms of energy, exergy efficiency and exergy destruction.
Titulo: Waste heat recovery and exergy-based comparison of a conventional and a novel fuel cell integrated gas turbine hybrid configuration

Sentencas: Using MATLAB, a detailed thermodynamic modelling has been done.
Titulo: Waste heat recovery and exergy-based comparison of a conventional and a novel fuel cell integrated gas turbine hybrid configuration

Sentencas: The finding shows that a twostage waste heat recovery system helps in reducing the temperature gradient at the inlet of fuel-cell, which makes the system more stable.
Titulo: Waste heat recovery and exergy-based comparison of a conventional and a novel fuel cell integrated gas turbine hybrid configuration

Sentencas: At a pressure ratio of 10 and turbine inlet temperature 1250 K, maximum energy and exergy efficiency have been achieved for the proposed hybrid system, i.e., 65.33% and 61.639%, respectively.
Titulo: Waste heat recovery and exergy-based comparison of a conventional and a novel fuel cell integrated gas turbine hybrid configuration

Sentencas: The waste heat recovery for recuperated gas-turbine is 119.462 kW, and for solid oxide fuel cell gas-turbine, is 1153.885 kW.
Titulo: Waste heat recovery and exergy-based comparison of a conventional and a novel fuel cell integrated gas turbine hybrid configuration
